application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: COMMUNAL TREESON FRONTAGE		T1-T5	London plane (Platanus x hispanica) Re Pollard. Final height = 9m and final spread = 5m	T6	Judas Tree 20% Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by approximately 1-2m to tidy and contain and retain furnishing growth. Final height = 3m and final spread = 3mT7-8	Sweet Gum (Liquidambar styraciflua)x2 Crown Lift to provide 3m clearance from ground level. Final height = 6m and final spread = 3mT9-10	Honey locust (Gleditsia triacanthos) Crown Lift to provide 3m clearance from ground level. Prune to clear buildings by up to 2m. Final height = 9m and final spread = 3m 	T11	Purple leaved plum Crown lift to 2.5m. Final height = 4m and final spread = 3m	T12-13 Katsura (Cerciiphyllum japonicum) 30% Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by approximately 2-3m to tidy and contain and retain furnishing growth. Final height = 8m and final spread = 4mT14	Snowy Mespilus (Amelanchier lamarckii) Remove dead stem. Final height = 2m and final spread = 1m	T15	Willow by river 20% Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by approximately 1-2m to tidy and contain and retain furnishing growth. Final height = 8m and final spread = 7m
